title: Family history: getting started
creator_credit: Video Education Australasia and Geoff Russell
brief_description: Searching for clues to their ancestral past has become a popular hobby and pastime for many Australians. Featuring expert input from Frances Brown, (Genealogy and Local History - State Library of Victoria) this program demonstrates how to begin researching your family history. We look at why people seek the information, how they go about it, and the skills needed to complete an accurate family history project.
